body: This makes me a bit nervous. I understand that we create temporary tensors that don't increase the refcount in `tinputs` and give a copy to `executor.run`. Now, do these copies retain? Do they decref when they are freed?
body_html: This makes me a bit nervous. I understand that we create temporary tensors that don't increase the refcount in tinputs and give a copy to executor.run. Now, do these copies retain? Do they decref when they are freed?
body_text: This makes me a bit nervous. I understand that we create temporary tensors that don't increase the refcount in tinputs and give a copy to executor.run. Now, do these copies retain? Do they decref when they are freed?
